citations.narrative:
During the inspection there were four drain covers that had been removed to facilitate cleaning of a gutter style drain that
had not been replaced after cleaning. Open drain covers could cause an animals foot to become entrapped or lead to
other injuries.
All housing facilities must be kept in good repair and protect the animals from injury.
Correct by November 3rd, 2023.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
3.1(a) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
During the inspection there were four drain covers that had been removed to facilitate cleaning of a gutter style drain that 
had not been replaced after cleaning. Open drain covers could cause an animals foot to become entrapped or lead to 
other injuries.  
All housing facilities must be kept in good repair and protect the animals from injury.  
Correct by November 3rd, 2023. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative. 
 
 n
